definition: To leave something or someone forever
example_sentence: He abandoned his car and walked home.

definition: The ability to hold or contain things or people
example_sentence: The stadium has a capacity of 50,000 people.

definition: To find out or decide something
example_sentence: We need to determine the cause of the problem.

definition: Working well without wasting time or resources
example_sentence: The new system is more efficient than the old one.
Solar panels generate electricity from sunlight.
Don't hesitate to ask for help if you need it.
The new law had a significant impact on business.

definition: An act of traveling from one place to another
example_sentence: The journey to the top of the mountain was difficult.

definition: Information and skills acquired through experience or education
example_sentence: He has extensive knowledge of history.

definition: The action of leading a group of people or an organization
example_sentence: Strong leadership is essential for success.

definition: To keep something in good condition
example_sentence: It's important to maintain regular exercise habits.

definition: To discuss something to reach an agreement
example_sentence: They will negotiate the terms of the contract.

definition: A chance for progress or advancement
example_sentence: This job offers many opportunities for growth.
